sn45.26:1.3: Sappurisanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami sappurisena sappurisataranca.
sn45.26:1.6: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti …pe… micchasamadhi—
sn45.26:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti …pe… micchasamadhi, micchanani, micchavimutti—
sn45.26:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti …pe… sammasamadhi—
sn45.26:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti …pe… sammasamadhi, sammanani, sammavimutti—
